name: CuberPunk 2089
description:
CuberPunk 2089 - A game with an open world in a cubical style from the first person!
At your disposal the whole city of the future Cube City with a huge bunch of tasks and Easter eggs!

- Lore
2089-year technology level is off scale, people no longer need to include brains ... Therefore, they became very vulnerable.
Welcome to Cube City - this is the first city that suffered an epidemic, many people were evacuated ...
